snippet: Nations are developing disruptive offensive software — at great potential risk.
abstract: Editorial warns of potential dangers inherent in development of disruptive, offensive software, which has increasingly become the focus of cybersecurity efforts in the United States; calls for new international understandings about what constitutes cyber aggression and how governments should respond.
lead_paragraph: Nations are developing disruptive offensive software — at great potential risk.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
